column1: #Text=" Mako says : " Asami , there you are .
#Text=I 've got something to tell you both .
#Text=Oh , I got to stop doing my own stunts .
#Text=" Mako says : " I found out who 's been stealing from Future Industries : Varrick .
#Text=" Asami says : " He attacked his own ship ?
#Text=He wants Republic City to go to war , and he wants control of the businesses that stand to profit the most from it .
#Text=" Asami says : " Varrick helped save Future Industries .
#Text=He 's my business partner now , not an evil mastermind .
#Text=" Bolin says : " See , this is why I had to move out .
#Text=" Asami says : " You guys are n't living together anymore ?
#Text=It was time for this eagle hawk to spread his wings and fly .
#Text=" Asami says : " Sounds like you 've had a pretty busy week .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Korra just left a week ago !
#Text=" Mako says : " Guys , listen to me .
#Text=Varrick is up to no good , and I have proof .
#Text=The detonators he uses in his movers are exactly like the one I found at the cultural center attack .
#Text=And those explosions were exactly like the ones the captain reported when Asami 's shipment was hijacked .
#Text=" Asami says : " Anyone could have gotten their hands on one of those detonators .
#Text=I 'm not going to let it go !
#Text=" Bodyguard says : " Varrick 's been looking for you .
